评论概述: Not what it looks like on the pictures
评论详情: I didn't really expect this to be a tiny crop top, as the pictures showed it to be a t shirt. I ordered a large because I wanted a nice sleep shirt and im left disappointed that this isn't what I had expected at all :(
The cutest tee! Cropped a bit, I’d size up!

Bought a size small for my daughter, who usually wears an adult size small.  She is just over 5 ft tall and there is no way she could even try this on it is so tiny. It could maybe fit a 10 year old girl.
Light weight shirt that is adorable. Purchased for my 12 year old granddaughter for Christmas. Can’t wait to see her reaction

Omg I love it. Wearing size Medium usually I’m between small and medium and I would say you should go one size up. Love the martinis print got so many compliments on it and the fabric is so soft and comfy. Going to order more of these!

评论概述: material is dry fit, not cotton
评论详情: the martini print is glossy and the shirt is see through and a thin athletic material that you'd find on shein or temu.

评论概述: Cute but material wasn’t what I expected
评论详情: The material is a little more rayon looking than expected but it’s still very cute, looks adorable on. Print quality is amazing, it’s comfortable and fits perfectly and sized appropriately

It might be my own fault but I didn't know this was going to be a crop top. My daughter definitely didn't want to wear it because she doesn't wear clothing that shows more skin than absolutely necessary. We gave it away and the recipient was very happy with it.
So so cute. I got a small and it fit perfectly. Quality is nice and not very see through which was surprising to me! Overall 10/10
Mine came and is a weird dri-fit material. Wanted it to be cotton and casual looking. Very disappointed.

评论概述: Wore for an hour before I realized the graphic had smudged ink on the neckline

评论详情: I ordered this for my daughter and here is her review: This shirt literally looks exactly like what it shows in the video. It's comfy and soft kind of like Shein top material but super cute!
The shirt is good quality but the print looks pixelated.
